text: My laptop keeps freezing and I can't get any work done!
Why does my phone battery die so quickly? It's brand new!
I can't connect to the internet on my computer, even though my Wi-Fi is working fine.
The software update completely messed up my computer. Now nothing works properly.
My printer won't print anything, even though it says it's connected.
Why does my computer take so long to start up? It's been like this for weeks.
The touch screen on my tablet stopped working for no reason.
I keep getting error messages when I try to open certain programs on my computer.
My headphones won't connect to my phone anymore, even though they used to work just fine.
The keyboard on my laptop is typing the wrong letters and it's driving me crazy!
